overview: It is Groundhog Day so, naturally, Porky Pig goes hunting groundhogs and takes his dopey dog, Mandrake. They soon encounter Grover Groundhog, who is none too thrilled to be the objective of a hunter on his big day. Mandrake is good at what he does but Mandrake is also a sucker for a sob story and Grover outwits him at every turn.
title: One Meat Brawl
